content.label:
I got this game around the timer first came out. This is one of the few games where I have unlocked everything on my own, including every single outfit customization. I keep coming back to this game because it‚Äôs fun and in a way hypnotic. It‚Äôs really great when you‚Äôre feeling stressful. It has its own challenges but you get used to the flow and you feel really good when you notice yourself improving. I might not be able to get past this second graveyard area now but it‚Äôs still fun for me to keep trying.

To the makers: I would really love to see more added to this game or even a brand new Flipping Legends game come out, though. Please consider it, and thanks for the fun!

title.label: Great Game, a Little Buggy at Higher Speeds

content.label:
This is an awesome game, and while it may be a "grind," i feel that is very much the point of the game. The hero selection is amazing and varied in terms of skills, abilities, and cosmetics (i love all of the comic skins- werewolf and ninja especially). The only gripes I have with the game is that
1) The characters have a level cap, after which they cannot improve any further; I've got the panda at lvl 10 and everyone else at 11, and once panda's maxed i don't have much reason to play.
2) It seems to struggle to keep up at higher speeds of flipping. Plus, the panda cub feature also seems to be slightly bugged by occasionally flipping onto the same space as the panda itself and glitching the game out; this happens especially when moving on from the castle. 
Other than that, it's a fantastic FREE game, and the ad placement is minimal and 95% optional. Keep up the great work, and keep adding experience levels!
Yep, it‚Äôs fun!

title.label: Do not buy chests from the store.

content.label: I like flipping legend, so I decided to spend a dollar to get ten chests. Like 4 of my rewards was exp buffs. FOUR. They don‚Äôt stack as far as I can tell and I can‚Äôt save them for later. I‚Äôve had this problem opening normal chests too. Once you have one exp buff make it so chests stop dropping them. I am completely in satisfied with what I got out of those chests. Also, I got like 5 skins (one of which I liked) when I was really hoping for gold. Please increase the drop rate of gold so that it is not impossible to get out of chests, because gold is so hard to farm in game. If it wasn‚Äôt for the chest rewards being dumb, I would rate this 5 stars.
It‚Äôs a really fun game and I hope they keep updating it.

Luv it üí™üåäüê¨üë®üèº‚Äçüé§üí©üëæü¶Ö

Such a simple concept but so well executed. When you get good at it, you can really fly along and the feeling is very zen-like, you‚Äôre in the zone ‚Äî the hallmark of a really good game. 

I‚Äôve been playing off and on since the game came out and really got back into it lately. I‚Äôm happy to see the dev still paying attention to this great game with an update.

Not a bad game, I was enjoying the music and gameplay and was interested in seeing all the different upgrades I could unlock. But after I unlocked my second character I noticed a problem. The costs for upgrades was getting ridiculously high as the game progressed to the point where I‚Äôd have to grind to just move up one tier for little effect. Not only that, but exp was a chore to collect too so on top of the gold costs, upgrades were few and far between. Then I found out the character max is at 10 so the skill I was grinding for is no longer available. I could reset my skill tree but I‚Äôd lose the gold I‚Äôd just spent so much time getting. I decided to bite bullet and watch the ads I‚Äôd been ignoring but it turns out the reward for watching the ads is minimal. On top of it all, to get back to my checkpoint it costs the so very precious gold I‚Äôm trying to save up. 

This was lengthy and dull but that is what the game has become which is a shame because I thought it was fun. It‚Äôs hard for a gamer to continue playing with no game progression or change. I would say try the game but this is what you‚Äôre getting into. If you‚Äôre willing to spend money on in game purchases you may have more fun than I did.
It‚Äôs a good game ‚Äî I enjoyed it. That said, it takes a ridiculously long time to upgrade your characters, even if you pay to remove ads.
Fast paced

I found this game on a YouTube video and I wanted to try it myself. I picked it up really quick and I‚Äôm getting better every round. I haven‚Äôt even had this game for 24 hours yet and I‚Äôm already loving it. There is a lot to unlock and upgrade. Definitely worth downloading. The only suggestion I would have is to add different ‚Äúthemes‚Äù like Christmas etc... Easily 5 stars. Side note, this is the only review I have ever written :D

title.label: Fantastic fun with a few issues

content.label:
Lots of fun.  Simple & enjoyable.

A couple notes for the developers.

The reset skills button isn't available on the monk or the sumo.

The skill trees are great, but sometimes something that seems like it will be cool, just doesn't work in practice.  Cases in point: 

The monk's skill needs to scrapped entirely.  It's horrible.  

The werewolf's skill seems underwhelming.  It's not broken like the monk, but c'mon, it's a werewolf. Should be something at least as fun as the other characters' skills!

I am excited to see what else you have planned!
